      • setResource

        void setResource(ResourceType type,
                 int amount)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                 InvalidResourceTypeException
        Set the amount of specific resource.
        Parameters:
        type - The ResourceType.
        amount - The new resource amount.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Will be thrown if the new amount is negative.
        InvalidResourceTypeException - Will be thrown if the resource specified is invalid.

      • hasEnoughResources

        boolean hasEnoughResources(ResourceType type,
                           int amount)
                    throws InvalidResourceTypeException
        Method to ensure the market have enough resources for user to purchase.
        Parameters:
        type - The ResourceType.
        amount - the amount of resource to check.
        Returns:
        If there are enough resources.
        Throws:
        InvalidResourceTypeException - Will be thrown if the resource specified is invalid.

        The sell price.

      • buyResource

        public void buyResource(ResourceType resource,
                        int amount)
        Buy Resource from the market, caller must be doing all the checks. For example, take money away from the player. This method will only increase the amount of specified resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The ResourceType
        amount - The amount of resource to buy in.

      • sellResource

        public void sellResource(ResourceType resource,
                         int amount)
        Sell Resource from the market, caller must be doing all the checks. For example, add money in to the player. This method will only decrease the amount of specified resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The ResourceType
        amount - The amount of resource to sell out.

      • generateRoboticon

        public void generateRoboticon()
        Generates a random amount of roboticons within a given range if the market contains ore.
